thread.title: Kim Kardashian enjoys 'Troop Beverly Hills'-style baby shower
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian enjoys 'Troop Beverly Hills'-style baby shower - UPI.com

author: Karen Butler
title: Kim Kardashian enjoys 'Troop Beverly Hills'-style baby shower
text:
| License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 25 (UPI) -- Reality television personality Khloe Kardashian took a break from sitting at her ailing husband Lamar Odom's hospital bedside and attended her sister Kim's baby shower Sunday.
The event celebrated the impending birth of Kim's second child -- and first son -- with her rapper spouse Kanye West. The shower had a Troop Beverly Hills , camping theme, Us Weekly reported .
Khloe, along with her mom Kris and sisters Kim and Kourtney Kardashian, as well as siblings Kendall and Kylie Jenner, all wore blue-and-white striped pajamas as they sipped tea, while sitting on the floor in front of indoor teepees.
The family shared on social media numerous pictures from the shower.
The party was initially planned for earlier this month, but was postponed when Odom was found unresponsive after binging on drugs and herbal, sexual performance-enhancement supplements at a Nevada brothel. He remains hospitalized, but his condition reportedly has been improving.
He and Khloe, who separated about two years ago, have called off their divorce in the wake of his medical crisis.
Baby shower vibes
A photo posted by King Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Oct 25, 2015 at 11:06am PDT
